=!SportsDevil=

<img align="center" src="http://s1.directupload.net/images/110424/he54f4fc.png">
<br>
!SportsDevil is a video addon for live sports and highlights, blogs and
TV. It's based on !VideoDevil, so big thanks to the developers. <br>
Please try it out and give me some feedback. <br>
<br>
<a href="http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?15ora2jm9cro7nj"><font size="4">Download</font></a>
or install via <a href="http://xbmc-development-with-passion.googlecode.com/files/repository.MaxMustermann.xbmc-1.0.0.zip">repo</a><br>
<br>

External players needed for:
  <ul>
  <li> Sopcast (<a href="http://forum.xbmc.org/showthread.php?t=108544">Howto use !SopCast as external player</a>)</li>
  <li> !StreamTorrent (<a href="http://forum.xbmc.org/showthread.php?t=108539">Howto use !StreamTorrent as external player</a>)</li>
  </ul>

Other addons needed for:
  <ul>
  <li> Veetle (needs Veetle addon)</li>
  <li> !YouTube (needs !YouTube addon)</li>
  <li> Freedocast (needs Freedocast addon)</li>
  </ul>

<br>
Installation:
<ol style="list-style-type: decimal;">
  <li> Go to addon browser</li>
  <li> Install from zip or via repo</li>
</ol>
